para.text: This function aim to check the df/dt latch value of under-frequency protection.
In the df/dt latch test, if df/dt value greater than the slips setting of the protection relay, the relay will latched and not permitted for action.

The process of this test is that when the test is started, the protection is in the permitted action status, and then the df/dt value is adjusted to greater than the slip latch value, while the protection is in the latched status, and the action is not allowed, at this time, the currently df/dt value is recorded.

para.text: Defined the initial frequency on each steps start. Usually is set to Fnom.

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Defined the start df/dt slip value. This value have to less than df/dt latch value of the protection relay.
Defined the destination df/dt slip value. This value have to greater than df/dt latch value of the protection relay.
Defined the ramping step df/dt value from start df/dt to destination df/dt. Reduce this value can increase the accuracy of test result.
